dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Takedown request - www.mikeinc.net]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, March 26, 2006 8:04 PM
To: kevin@camwhores.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Takedown request - www.mikeinc.net]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Takedown request - www.mikeinc.net
Date: Fri, 24 Mar 2006 14:55:07 -0600
From: Kevin - Camwhores <kevin@camwhores.com>
To: copyright@theplanet.com
CC: abuse@theplanet.com


This is the fifth DMCA takedown request we have sent to the owners of
www.mikeinc.net.

Materials infringed: (second time they have appeared on this site, both
times posted by the owner of the site)

http://mikeinc.net/forum/attachments/Aceentrance_1[12].jpg
http://mikeinc.net/forum/attachments/Aceentrance_2[13].jpg
http://mikeinc.net/forum/attachments/Aceentrance_3[14].jpg
Any other materials obtained from Camwhores.com, or containing the
Camwhores.com logo.

We are the copyright holder of images contained in the above URLs.
The owner of www.mikeinc.net is not authorized to redistribute these images.

We believe all information in this notice to be accurate. I am authorized to
act on behalf of the owners of the materials in question.



Kevin Day
~~ Electronic Signature ~~
Camwhores.com
P.O. Box 326
Round Lake Beach, IL 60172
kevin@camwhores.com



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEJ0gfvK/XpJs6oyURAv/WAJwNj17+0e7nFkPn35871Dy/jm66lQCZAWYr
xTzL8OKsnQbM2/IEnaRA2fk=
=HW/1
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
